item.description:
Meditation: The Power of Inner Stillness 

A workshop with Jim Rose, MEd

When you shut off the TV, the computer, the hype, the spin, the frenzy, the chatter of the mind and the drama of daily life, do you ever just sit and listen to the silence? Wouldn’t it be nice if shutting everything off were that easy?

Today more than ever, we need to find a place of peace for ourselves, a place of clarity, tranquility, and renewal. Meditation takes us there, to the stillness within our deepest most being.

Stillness is not a state of nothingness. It is a place where you connect with the love, Light, and wisdom innate in you. It is where you become receptive to the power of your soul, the place of intersection between you and divine consciousness. It is where you realize you are a spiritual being, a spark of the Divine.

If you have ever attended one of Jim’s workshops, you know how special they are. A former vice-president with Johnson and Johnson, Jim has led corporate workshops all over the globe. He was recognized by Human Resources Executive magazine as one of the top HR executives in the US.

Jim also facilitates programs for Science of Spirituality worldwide, and we are delighted to welcome him back to Boston.

This program includes a free, light vegetarian lunch. Registration required.

See our New England Calendar and visit our new website.

Please do not park in Center’s driveway. There is free parking on the street.
